page.title: 09LOCAL COMMUNITY OF STARCROSS
page.content: We interviewed the local vicar about the area and discovered that{Starcross has 2 doctors and surgery and hospital.The hospital is due to close in May 1986.This is the main concern of the local people.The hospital used to house 700 patients but now it is down to 80.The building might be knocked down to make room for 200 houses.The way{Starcross}is growing it is putting a lot of pressure on the shop keepers.{Starcross}is increasing its size every year and soon it could be a suburb of{Exeter.}The local transport is the train which stops twice a day and the buses.Bowling is the main hobby of{Starcross people.The Royal British Legion is popular because it enables them to play skittles.Unemployment in {Starcross}is about the national average.
